GDevelop is an open-source game creator,: GDevelop is an open-source game creator, tailored for fast and intuitive game making.
Publish your web game on Poki: Publish your web game on Poki
GDevelop was created with love by: GDevelop is met liefde gecre√´erd door
who added features, fixed bugs, sent new: die extra functies heeft toegevoegd, bugs heeft opgelost, nieuwe voorbeelden heeft verzonden, tutorials heeft geschreven en de gemeenschap heeft geholpen.
BUB is a very special, one of a kind cri: BUB is een heel bijzonder, uniek wezen. Meer specifiek is ze de [meest geweldige kat op aarde](http://lilbub.com)... en haar game is gemaakt met GDevelop!
The game is a retro 8-bit game, with bea: De game is een retro 8-bit game, met prachtige kunst en soundtrack, die afwisselt tussen platformerniveaus, met verborgen geheimen, en schutter levels met bazen, meerdere vijanden en bonussen.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: Hyperspace Dogfights is een sappige jet-gevechtsroguelike waarin je het blast, dodge en je weg snijdt door massa's van technologisch inferieure vijanden.
As your intergalactic intervention missi: Naarmate uw missie intergalactische interventie uw adaptieve hyper-jet zal uitgroeien tot iets sterker en vreemder door het verzamelen van enkele honderden artikelen beschikbaar in het spel.
Imagine and publish your games with GDev: Beeld je in en publiceer je games met GDevelop. Gebundeld met tutorials en voorbeelden.
Add ads to your game with AdMob: Add ads to your game with AdMob
Use AdMob in your GDevelop games to disp: Use AdMob in your GDevelop games to display ads and reward videos to your players
Go to [AdMob website](https://www.google: Go to [AdMob website](https://www.google.com/admob/) and create an account. Then, create a new app from the Admob interface and an ad unit. Note the identifiers for both the app and the ad unit, as they will be used in your game.
In GDevelop, open the properties of your: In GDevelop, open the properties of your game and paste the AdMob **app id**. This will be identified to use your application for AdMob to deliver ads.
Add events in your game to load and show: Add events in your game to load and show the ad when needed (this can be when a level is successfully completed for example). Paste in the parameters of the action the ad unit identifier. You can also enter "test" for loading a test ad.
You can test and publish your game on An: You can test and publish your game on Android directly from GDevelop. In the editor, open your game and then the Export window. Choose Android, click on Export and wait a few minutes.
How to publish to Android in one click: How to publish to Android in one click
Contribute to GDevelop - Open-source HTM: Draag bij aan GDevelop - Open-source HTML5 game-making tool
GDevelop is an open-source project (even: GDevelop is een open-source project (zelfs deze website): iedereen kan bijdragen en de software verbeteren!

Help us by translating GDevelop!: Help ons bij het vertalen van GDevelop!
It's easy to get the source code of GDev: Het is makkelijk om de broncode van GDevelop te krijgen en te starten met dingen verbeteren!
The forum and the Discord chat are the p: Het forum en de Discord chat zijn de plek om hulp te krijgen en aan te bieden aan andere gebruikers van GDevelop!
Follow GDevelop on Facebook and Twitter:: Volg GDevelop op Facebook en Twitter:
For most beginners and even advanced use: Voor de meeste beginners en zelfs gevorderde gebruikers zijn de tutorials en help-pagina de meest waardevolle bronnen om snel geweldige games te maken. Op de wiki kun je tutorials schrijven of bestaande tutorials verbeteren.
Create custom behaviors for your game ob: Create custom behaviors for your game objects in GDevelop
In a few clicks, you can create new beha: In a few clicks, you can create new behaviors for your game objects - using events or JavaScript.
Flash is a custom behavior that is creat: Flash is a custom behavior that is created directly from GDevelop - allowing an object to blink
Create custom behaviors - directly from: Create custom behaviors - directly from GDevelop editor
GDevelop allows you to create new behavi: GDevelop allows you to create new behaviors, using the same events as the ones that you're using to create the rules of your game.
Want enemies to automatically follow the: Want enemies to automatically follow the player?
Want some rockets to target the player?: Want some rockets to target the player?
Want enemies and the players to have hea: Want enemies and the players to have health and take damage?
Behaviors can be created for any kind of: Behaviors can be created for any kind of object, and you can create custom actions and conditions associated to your new behavior.
An action is exposed by the behavior, an: An action is exposed by the behavior, and can be used like any other action in the events
Read the documentation about custom beha: Read the documentation about custom behaviors
Import new behaviors, created by the GDe: Import new behaviors, created by the GDevelop community
Behaviors, as well as extensions, can be: Behaviors, as well as extensions, can be shared between projects. You can **export and import** them in a few clicks. If your behavior is generic and reusable in multiple games, you can even submit it to be integrated in the growing list of custom behaviors shared by the community.
Create your game by assembling behaviors: Create your game by assembling behaviors
Progressively create custom behaviors fo: Progressively create custom behaviors for objects in your game
ideal for large games and keeping simple: ideal for large games and keeping simple events.
Search for new behaviors in the list of: Search for new behaviors in the list of behaviors shared by the community
Download GDevelop or try it online - cre: Download GDevelop of probeer het online - zonder programmering games maken
GDevelop is free and can be used for pro: GDevelop is gratis en kan worden gebruikt voor het maken van spellen met of zonder winstoogmerk.
GDevelop runs on Windows, macOS and most: GDevelop draait op Windows, macOS en de meest recente Linux-distributies. Je kunt het ook online proberen met behulp van Chrome, Firefox of een andere recente webbrowser.
Wonder what's new in latest versions? Fi: Wonder what's new in latest versions? Find the release notes in the app or [online](https://github.com/4ian/GDevelop/releases).
This is an [AppImage](https://appimage.o: This is an [AppImage](https://appimage.org/). **Make it executable first** and run it. For example: `chmod a+x GDevelop*.AppImage && ./GDevelop*.AppImage`.
To create your first game, start by read: Om je eerste game te maken, begin met het lezen van een tutorial:
GDevelop is an open-source project. You: GDevelop is een open-source project. Je kunt meehelpen in de gemeenschap door het te verbeteren!
Learn how to contribute: Informatie over hoe je bij kunt dragen
Gdevelop 4 can still be downloaded. GDev: GDevelop 4 kan nog steeds worden gedownload. GDevelop 5 wordt aanbevolen voor elke nieuwe gebruiker, omdat GDevelop 4 niet meer zal worden bijgewerkt! Er zal geen ondersteuning meer zijn voor GDevelop 4 in de toekomst: we adviseren elke GDevelop 4 gebruiker om te upgraden naar GDevelop 5.
Even if GDevelop 4 supports native games: Zelfs als GDevelop 4 inheemse games ondersteunt, raden wij aan om over te schakelen naar GDevelop 5 en HTML5 games, die beter worden ondersteund. Inheemse spellen zullen later worden toegevoegd aan GDevelop 5.
GDevelop for the education - Teach game: GDevelop voor het onderwijs - lesgeven over het maken van games
Using GDevelop in classroom is a perfect: Het gebruik van GDevelop in de klas is een perfecte gelegenheid om les te geven over programmeren, games maken en de creativiteit van studenten naar boven te halen.
GDevelop has already been used in classr: GDevelop is al gebruikt in klaslokalen en online cursussen, met digitale media studenten of kinderen in de eerste klas!
Please send us your photos and tweets if: Stuur ons aub je foto's en tweets als je GDevelop voor een cursus gebruikt!
Install new extensions in GDevelop and s: Install new extensions in GDevelop and share yours
Install new extensions and share them: Install new extensions and share them
Search and add new features to your game: Search and add new features to your game in a few clicks.
Search in the library of extensions, rea: Search in the library of extensions, ready to be installed in one click
Directly from the editor, you can explor: Directly from the editor, you can explore the **online library of extensions** (also called a "package manager" or an "extension store"). Extensions can bring *new behaviors* for your game objects, or *actions, conditions* or expressions that are ready to use in events.
**Featured extensions** are peer reviewe: **Featured extensions** are peer reviewed. They are ideal to add new features at a fast pace to your game, making both prototyping of new games a very quick process and allowing larger games to be constructed by assembling extensions.
Export your own extensions and share the: Export your own extensions and share them
All extensions can be exported to a file: All extensions can be exported to a file. They can easily be shared and integrated to another project. Better, if you have created a useful extension, you can submit it to be integrated to the library of [open-source, community extensions](https://github.com/4ian/GDevelop-extensions).
As extensions are constructed using the: As extensions are constructed using the intuitive GDevelop events sheets, they can be composed of events, [JavaScript or a mix of both](/javascript-game-engine).
How to start a new extension: How to start a new extension
Extensions can provide new behaviors tha: Extensions can provide new behaviors that can be added to your game objects.

Now, get your phone and **open messenger: Dus, pak je telefoon en **open messenger**. Start een gesprek, kies Games en klik op het icoontje van je game om te starten met spelen!

Imagining and creating the rules of your: Imagining and creating the rules of your game do not imply to learn the syntax of a complex programming language. Hyperspace Dogfights, a game created wit: Hyperspace Dogfights, a game created with GDevelop
A juicy jet-combat roguelike game, made: A juicy jet-combat roguelike game, made with GDevelop.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-combat roguelike in which you'll blast, dodge and slice your way through masses of technologically inferior enemies. As your intergalactic intervention mission progresses, your adaptive hyper-jet will evolve into something stronger and weirder by gathering some of the hundreds of items available in the game.
Hyperspace Dogfights began as a side pro: Hyperspace Dogfights begon als een zijproject aan onze nu geannuleerde ruimteverkenning roguelike Hyperspace Admirals. HDog's prototype bestond eind 2016, waarna het een beperkte vroegtijdige toegangsrelease op itch.io heeft ontvangen. In de loop van 2017 werd het grootste deel van de inhoud ontwikkeld en werd rekening gehouden met continue alfa-feedback. De game was feature-complete in maart 2018, waarna de release werd aangekondigd.
Fierce and juicy 2d jet combat against m: Fierce and juicy 2d jet combat against masses of air and ground based enemies
Hundreds of stackable passives, over fif: Hundreds of stackable passives, over fifty weapons and actives; all geared towards producing weird synergies with another
High replayability, your will evolve a l:
Hoge herspeelbaarheid, je zult bij elke vlucht een beetje anders evolueren

De Kickstarter was in eerste instantie gelanceerd met $100,000 als doel, maar behaalde $148,000! GOED GEDAAN BUB.

Express your small and big ideas: you ca: Express your small and big ideas: you can prototype new features on your games in minutes, and refine them without limits. [Making games](/games-showcase) has never been so easy and fast, with [the visual editors](/game-editors) provided by GDevelop.

Using JavaScript to make your games with: Met behulp van JavaScript games maken met GDevelop
GDevelop supports JavaScript to create y: GDevelop ondersteunt JavaScript je games te maken of de game-engine uit te breiden.
JavaScript can be used to write part of: JavaScript kan samen met evenementen worden gebruikt om een deel van een game te schrijven
Add JavaScript code blocks inside your g: Voeg JavaScript code blokken toe in je game
GDevelop supports adding JavaScript code: GDevelop ondersteunt het toevoegen van JavaScript-codeblokken op elk moment tijdens de gebeurtenissen van je game. Het is een goede manier om een ‚Äã‚Äãcomplex algoritme te implementeren, of functies van open-source bibliotheken te hergebruiken. Gebeurtenissen en codeblokken kunnen naadloos met elkaar worden gemixt - dus je kunt onderdelen of zelfs de totaliteit van je game met JavaScript implementeren!
The JavaScript editor is based on the su: De JavaScript bewerker is gebaseerd op de superkrachtige Monaco-editor, die is ge√´xtraheerd uit [Visual Studio Code] (https://code.visualstudio.com/). Intellisense autocompleties worden aangeboden en de editor ondersteunt geavanceerde functies zoals multi-selectie voor snellere codering.
Learn more about using JavaScript: Meer informatie over het gebruik van JavaScript
GDevelop is modular and can be extended: GDevelop is modulair en kan uitgebreid worden om aan uw behoeften te voldoen. Alle functies die beschikbaar zijn voor games in het bijzonder (objecten, gedragingen, evenementen) zijn gebaseerd op het uitbreidingssysteem. Je kunt snel nieuwe extensies maken voor je game of bijdragen aan bestaande games aangezien GDevelop [open-source](https://github.com/4ian/GD) is.
The Dark theme being used in GDevelop. T: Het donkere thema wordt gebruikt in GDevelop. De code-editor wordt ook gebundeld geleverd met verschillende mooie thema's!
\n## Overview\n\nThis website (https://g:
## Overview

This website (https://gdevelop-app.com), related websites (https://forum.gdevelop-app.com, https://wiki.gdevelop-app.com, https://editor.gdevelop-app.com) and related applications (GDevelop), referred to as the Service, are operated by FLORIAN RIVAL. Throughout the site, the terms ‚Äúwe‚Äù, ‚Äúus‚Äù and ‚Äúour‚Äù refer to FLORIAN RIVAL.

This page is used to inform visitors and users regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use the Service.

If you choose to use the Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that we collect is used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at https://gdevelop-app.com/legal/terms-and-conditions unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.

## Information Collection and Use

For a better experience, while using our Service, we may require you, for example in the case of creating an account, to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to your email. The information that we request will be stored in a database of the Service.

The Service does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you.

## Log Data

We want to inform you that whenever you use the Service, in a case of an error in the app we collect data and information (through third party products) on your device called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (‚ÄúIP‚Äù) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.

These data are used to monitor the proper working on the Service and fix it in case of issues.

Link to privacy policy of some third party service providers used by the website and applications for Log Data:

- Sentry: https://sentry.io/privacy/

## Analytics Data

We want to inform you that whenever you use the Service, at various points in the app we collect data and information (through third party products) on your device called Analytics Data. This Analytics Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (‚ÄúIP‚Äù) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.

These data are aggregated and used to understand how people use the Service and improve it.

Link to privacy policy of some third party service providers used by the website and applications for Analytics:

- Keen.io: https://keen.io/privacy-policy/
- Google Analytics: https://policies.google.com/privacy

## Cookies

Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory.
This Service stores a ‚Äúcookie‚Äù when you create or log in to an account. However, the app may use third party code and libraries that use ‚Äúcookies‚Äù to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.

## Service Providers

We may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:

- To facilitate our Service;
- To provide the Service on our behalf;
- To perform Service-related services; or
- To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.

We want to inform users of this Service that these third parties can have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.

Link to privacy policy of some third party service providers used by the website and applications:

- Google Play Services: https://policies.google.com/privacy
- Firebase: https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy
- Amazon Web Services: https://aws.amazon.com/privacy/

## Security

We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

## Links to Other Sites

This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by us. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.

## Children‚Äôs Privacy

These Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. In the case we discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, We immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we will be able to do necessary actions.

## Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.

## Contact Us

If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at [gdevelop-app-support@googlegroups.com](gdevelop-app-support@googlegroups.com).
Make your own 8-bit and pixelart games: Maak je eigen 8-bit en pixelart games
Sprite editor and tools to make your own: Sprite-editor en tools om je eigen 8-bit game te maken met GDevelop
See Piskel sprite editor being used insi: Zie de sprite-editor van Piskel die in GDevelop wordt gebruikt om een ‚Äã‚Äã8-bit game te maken
GDevelop is bundled with [Piskel](https:: GDevelop is gebundeld met [Piskel](https://www.piskelapp.com/), een krachtige en gebruiksvriendelijke 2D sprite-editor. Het is het perfecte hulpmiddel om pixelart middelen te gebruiken om een retro gevoel aan je game te geven. Je kunt objecten maken met meerdere animaties, op elk moment de sprites bewerken en het resultaat bekijken door de preview van je game te lanceren.
Download GDevelop to try Piskel: GDevelop downloaden om Piskel te proberen
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH: a 8 bit game made: Lil Bub's HALLO AARDE: een 8 bit game gemaakt met GDevelop
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH is a retro 8-bit g: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH is een retro 8-bit game met prachtige art en soundtrack, die afwisselt tussen platformerlevels met verborgen geheimen en shooter levels met bazen, meerdere vijanden en bonussen.
Read more about Lil BUB's game: Lees meer over Lil BUB's game
See other games made with GDevelop: Andere games bekijken gemaakt met GDevelop
Your GDevelop game on the Poki web platf: Your GDevelop game on the Poki web platform
Get an audience of 30 million gamers fro: Get an audience of 30 million gamers from all over the world for your game.
Discover what Poki can do for your game: Discover what Poki can do for your game
[Poki.com](https://poki.com/) is a curat: [Poki.com](https://poki.com/) is a curated discovery platform for free, high-quality online games. Reach hundred of millions of players around the globe and get a lifetime revenue share from advertising when your game is played.
Export your game as an HTML5 game: Export your game as an HTML5 game
From GDevelop, choose to [export your ga: From GDevelop, choose to [export your game as HTML5](http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/publishing/html5_game_in_a_local_folder). The result is a web game, running with WebGL, that can be played on any recent desktop and mobile browser.
In GDevelop, open your game and then the: In GDevelop, open your game and then the Export window. Choose **Local folder**, click on Export and wait a few seconds to get your game ready.
On the developer page of Poki.com, get i: On the developer page of Poki.com, get in touch with Poki team or directly submit your game. Use [GDevelop JavaScript features](/javascript-game-engine) to integrate their lightweight SDK. When your game is published on Poki, get real-time insights into how your game is doing and support from their tech team.
There either has been an error or you ca: There either has been an error or you cancelled the subscription. If you want to get a subscription to support GDevelop and unlock online services, try again to choose one from GDevelop (*My Profile* menu).
As an open-source software, GDevelop req: As an open-source software, GDevelop requires time and money to be developed and sustainable. Thanks for your contribution! If you want to get more involved, you can also [read all the ways](/contribute) to contribute to GDevelop ecosystem.
You can now **go back to GDevelop** to u: You can now **go back to GDevelop** to use the additional online exports and services.
